Package swinghelper.util

Class SwingUtils

java.lang.Object
swinghelper.util.SwingUtils
public class SwingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
A utility class to make constructing containers to add to the processing window easier.

    • callMethodOnClick

      public static void callMethodOnClick​(javax.swing.AbstractButton button, java.lang.String method)
      Calls a certain method if the inputed button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      button - Button that calls the method when pressed
      method - name of the method (mustn't take any inputs)

    • callMethodOnClick

      public static void callMethodOnClick​(javax.swing.AbstractButton button, java.lang.String method, int param)
      Calls a certain method if the inputed button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      button - Button that calls the method when pressed
      method - name of the method must take one int as input
      param - integer that gets put into the method if the button is pressed.

    • setReference

      public static void setReference​(java.lang.Object ref)
      Sets the reference where the methods should be looked up.

    • callMethodOnClick

      public static void callMethodOnClick​(javax.swing.AbstractButton button, java.lang.String method, java.lang.Object refe)
      Calls a certain method if the inputed button is pressed. The object where the method can be found will be taken as input
      Parameters:
      button - Button that calls the method when pressed
      method - name of the method (mustn't take any inputs)
      refe - object where the method is searched

    • callMethodOnClick

      public static void callMethodOnClick​(javax.swing.AbstractButton button, java.lang.String method, java.lang.Object refe, int param)
      Calls a certain method if the inputed button is pressed. The object where the method can be found will be taken as input
      Parameters:
      button - Button that calls the method when pressed
      method - name of the method must take one int as input
      refe - object where the method is searched
      param - integer that gets put into the method if the button is pressed.
